articles.title: Doctor accused of secretly recording 4,500 videos in Australian hospital restrooms released on bail - AP News
articles.description: A trainee surgeon in Australia has been released on bail after being accused of secretly recording hundreds of medical colleagues in hospital restrooms. A judge released Ryan Cho from custody Friday to live with his Singaporean parents in Melbourne. The court…
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) A trainee surgeon was released from custody on bail Friday after he was accused of secretly video recording hundreds of medical colleagues in the restrooms of Australian hos… [+2239 chars]
